Bert Nichols

  1. Foster Name: Bert
  2. Foster Family: Berend and Trentje Brauwer
  3. Foster Family Alt: Bower
  4. Location of Family: Rosemont, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Christian Children's Home at Council Bluffs
  6. Arrival Place: Norfolk, NE
  7. Age on Arrival: Unknown
  8. Date of Birth: Unknown
  9. Date of Death: 1963-01-08, Omaha, NE
  10. Gender: male
  11. Spouse Name: Bertha Kerr
  12. Source: The Families of Rosemont, NE, 1890-1990 (n.p.), p. 18-20, [9728. 2992 R815 C],
